panel.title: Average Difference In Days Between Date Added and First Listen

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added ] | eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats avg(diff) as average | eval average= abs(round(average))

panel.title: Most Common Difference in Days Between Date Added and First Listen

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added ] | eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats mode(diff) as common | eval common = round(abs(common))

panel.title: Median Difference In Days Between Date Added and First Listen

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added ] | eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats median(diff) as average | eval average= abs(round(average))

panel.title: Average Difference In Days Between Date Added and First Listen By Frequency

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added ] | eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats count by diff | sort -diff | rename diff as "Difference between date added and first listen", count as "Track count"

panel.title: Average Difference In Days Between Date Added and First Listen When Date Added Was First

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added |eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) ] | where added < earliestlisten | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats avg(diff) as average | eval average= abs(round(average))

panel.title: Average Difference In Days Between Date Added and First Listen Where First Listen Was First

search.query: | inputlookup earliesttracklistens.csv |table track_name,earliestlisten | appendcols [| search index=music sourcetype="itunes_xml" | table date_added |eval added=round(strptime(date_added,"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")) ] | where added > earliestlisten | eval diff = (added-earliestlisten) | eval diff=round(diff/86400) | stats avg(diff) as average | eval average= abs(round(average))

table.title: Tracks where the listen count is more than 3.5 * the standard deviation for all listens for that artist

search.query: `lastfm` | stats count by artist,track_name | eventstats stdev(count) as threshold by artist | search threshold > 0 | where count>threshold | eventstats count(track_name) as track_count by artist | search track_count = 1 | where count>(3.5*threshold)
